description: 20 resume-vacancy pairs with known skill matches for accuracy validation (90%+ target)

pairs.name: Perfect Java Developer Match
pairs.resume_text:
John Anderson
Senior Software Engineer
Email: john@example.com

TECHNICAL SKILLS
Java, Spring Boot, PostgreSQL, Hibernate, Docker, Kubernetes, Git, Maven, Jenkins, REST

EXPERIENCE
Senior Java Developer at TechCorp (2020-Present)
- Developed microservices using Spring Boot and PostgreSQL
- Deployed applications using Docker and Kubernetes
- Set up CI/CD with Jenkins

Java Developer at StartupXYZ (2017-2020)
- Built REST APIs with Spring Framework
- Used Hibernate ORM with PostgreSQL databases
